message:
Hi!

We would like to remind you that your Quotation [{{ doc.name }}] is set to expire on {{ doc.valid_till }}. Please take any necessary actions to renew or proceed with this quotation before the expiration date.

Quotation Details:

Quotation ID: {{ doc.name }}
Customer Name: {{ doc.customer_name }}
Total Amount: {{ doc.grand_total }}
Valid Till: {{ doc.valid_till }}

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to contact us.

Thank you for your attention to this matter
name: Quotation Expiry Reminder
subject: Reminder: Quotation [{{ doc.name }}] Expiring in 30 Days
